objects.name: NewTex
objects.string:
Read the manual at the bottom to find out how to solve the hole game, 
solve the hole game before time runs out. If time runs out, 
or if you put a shape in the wrong hole, the device blows up.

objects.name: Dialouge
objects.string: Thats it. Im sick of this stupid box. In the dump you go.

parameters: "(Reading box) To dispose of device, refer to the manual."

"To destroy, shoot in the hole untill the magical levitating healthbar goes to zero.


*note, this paper is flameproof."
